mods.name: Clothing Tweaker
mods.description: Allows you to adjust the warmth, warmth when wet, waterproof, windproof, protection, mobility and weight values of clothing items. **A lag issue has been reported on saves with lots of clothing. This may cause autosaves after passing time (specifically reported as while cooking). This will be addressed in the next version. Until then, use with caution!**

mods.name: Crafting Anywhere
mods.description: Allows you to remove the location requirements from craftable items (workbench, forge etc)
